subject: [RFC PATCH v1 0/7] Open HugeTLB allocation routine for more generic use

reviews.summary: Raised questions about the applicability of the patch to guest_memfd, suggesting clarification on whether the allocation failure case optimization is also relevant for guest_memfd.
